message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. It's a great price considering the product's value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $70. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you at $80, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's the minimum I'm willing to accept.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $80, but I've found a better deal elsewhere. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product, but I'm not going any higher.
